title: Unable to use screen mirroring on my google pixel 4 to my sony Bravia tv KD49X7002F
content: I have made a multiple tries to connect my google pixel 4 device to my sony Bravia Tv KD49X7002F. I have tried with other phone too but there is an issue only with the google pixel 4 device everytime. Please provide a resolution to this problem as soon as possible
